snippet.title: Athena Crisis: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#athenacrisis #indiegame #turnbased 

Athena Crisis is a modern retro turn-based strategy game that places you in command of 40+ units in your journey across the multiverse. Experience a lengthy campaign, or build your own maps and campaigns with the built-in editor. Start a game on PC or Mac, then seamlessly take it on the go on your iPhone, Android, or Steam Deck!

Athena Crisis is available now!

Get it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2456430/Athena_Crisis/
Or direct on the Web: https://app.athenacrisis.com/checkout
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/athenacrisis
